Text: Thanks a lot for all of these classic books you have been uploading. Its been great getting a chance to read them.
Thanks for all the hard work. There are a few that won't open with Gon-Visor (man of war, etc.) which program would you suggest.

I use CBRreader, it has no troubles

and you're all welcome
Are these scans of comics you own or did you find them online? Either way, thanks for posting all of these Golden Age comics. Most of these are things that we wouldn't see reprinted.
some are mine (especially my earlier uploads, while others I found at the golden age site I post at, www.comicbookplus.com  go there and feel free to join and download all the golden age goodness!
